body:
Fixes #11027 

tested with
```
[balay@pj03 spack]$ spack find -v hypre
==> 6 installed packages
-- linux-fedora29-x86_64 / gcc@8.3.1 ----------------------------
hypre@2.10.0b~debug~int64+internal-superlu+mpi patches=0494fe8c1f64d873e6d77adc07f3dbfe98721d6e0bb539f313ab9c14ca6579f1,65cea7ddbf2a2b2ccaac57b0c1bd52749255972a0f58186d9722e905ad4153c9 +shared+superlu-dist
hypre@2.12.1~debug~int64+internal-superlu+mpi patches=65cea7ddbf2a2b2ccaac57b0c1bd52749255972a0f58186d9722e905ad4153c9 +shared+superlu-dist
hypre@2.14.0~debug~int64+internal-superlu+mpi patches=65cea7ddbf2a2b2ccaac57b0c1bd52749255972a0f58186d9722e905ad4153c9 +shared+superlu-dist
hypre@2.15.0~debug~int64+internal-superlu+mpi patches=da60725bfecb4595457a78750ac33b2bc67e6155d2adfdbe6125bda53e776796 +shared+superlu-dist
hypre@2.15.1~debug~int64+internal-superlu+mpi patches=da60725bfecb4595457a78750ac33b2bc67e6155d2adfdbe6125bda53e776796 +shared+superlu-dist
hypre@develop~debug~int64+internal-superlu+mpi patches=da60725bfecb4595457a78750ac33b2bc67e6155d2adfdbe6125bda53e776796 +shared+superlu-dist
[balay@pj03 spack]$ 
```
cc: @balos1
title: hypre: add a modified superlu-dist patch for @:2.14.0
